title: Player Behaviour - Reports?
body:
I play every day and often I will need to report someone for something. I get very offended sometimes and I feel like my reports mean nothing. 

Ever since the new system came in, I haven't been given a single notification that someone I reported was punished. I'm close to quitting NOT because I can't play without being abused, but because I can't do anything about it.
Do I perhaps report too many people? I always feel like my reports are justified however.

replies.body: This is what I usually do. Stay silent unless communication is really needed, even if they are feeding I just try to encourage them unless they are actually trolling or and purposely feeding. Usually we lose the match and I leave all my rage at the end and report them, then I realise reporting does nothing.
Depends, might be justified in your head but not everyone elses.

Same here.... last week i remember i report over 10 people in a day.......some of them is the same user coz they play bot in ARAM games and make us lose coz they feed really hard......but after hours/ days I saw them playing again same.....wondering did they got punished. or is the punishment to light?
